title: Does the "Muslim embargo" imposed by President Donald Trump exclude countries in which he has business?
subtitle: The President acknowledged that he had "a little conflict of interest" because of a licensing transaction in Turkey, but it was unclear whether the countries listed in his executive order for migration had been affected by his commercial interests.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: The Donald Trump Executive Order, which restricts the travel of the United States from Muslim-majority nations, does not cover countries where it has commercial interests.
